City Council Members

Mayor Jim Ross

Mayor
  • 817-459-6122
  • First elected in 2021, Mayor Ross represents the City at Large.

Mauricio Galante

District 1 Council Member
  • 817-459-6141
  • Elected in May 2024, Council Member Galante represents District 1.

Raul H. Gonzalez

Council Member District 2
  • 817-459-6143
  • Elected in November 2020, Council Member Gonzalez represents District 2. He is Deputy Mayor Pro-Tempore.

Nikkie Hunter

Council Member District 3
  • 817-459-6141
  • Elected in June 2021, Council Member Hunter represents District 3.

Andrew Piel

Council Member District 4
  • 817-459-6141
  • Elected in May 2019, Council Member Piel represents District 4.

Rebecca Boxall

Council Member District 5
  • 817-459-6143
  • Elected in May 2021, Council Member Boxall represents District 5.

Long Pham

Council Member District 6
  • 817-459-6143
  • First elected in June 2022, Council Member Pham represents At-Large District 6.

Bowie Hogg

Council Member District 7
  • 817-459-6143
  • First elected in May 2022, Council Member Hogg represents At-Large District 7.

Dr. Barbara Odom-Wesley

Council Member District 8
  • 817-459-6141
  • First elected in May 2019, Council Member Odom-Wesley represents At-Large District 8. She is Mayor Pro-Tempore.
